title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 250.4 - Section 73 of the Civil Rights Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 250.4 - Section 73 of the Civil Rights Law

State Regulations

The commission hereby incorporates into its hearing
procedures all requirements and protections that section 73 of the New York

Civil Rights Law provides for parties or witnesses who appear before the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
250.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
